blogs.title: Breaking Bad
blogs.author: Walter White
blogs.body: Walter White, a chemistry teacher, discovers that he has cancer and decides to get into the meth-making business to repay his medical debts. His priorities begin to change when he partners with Jesse.

blogs.title: The Walking Dead
blogs.author: Daryl Dixon
blogs.body: In the wake of a zombie apocalypse, various survivors struggle to stay alive. As they search for safety and evade the undead, they are forced to grapple with rival groups and difficult choices.
